thread.title: Business Breakfast LIVE: Carr's Group delivers 'solid' results, plus latest news
thread.title_full: Business Breakfast LIVE: Carr's Group delivers 'solid' results, plus latest news

author: Coreena Ford
title: Business Breakfast LIVE: Carr's Group delivers 'solid' results, plus latest news
text:
Carr's former Kirkcaldy Flour Mill which was sold during its financial year Share 
Hello and welcome to the Journal Business team's morning live blog for Monday, November 14. 
I'm Coreena Ford and I'm running the live blog all of this week, to bring you regular updates on all the breaking business news from across the North East and beyond. 
The business breakfast live blog covers the latest big stories from the region's business community, as well as national news, FTSE updates and stock exchange announcements from the Journal region's listed companies and national firms - anything and everything from the world of business basically. 
This morning we have full year results from Carr's Group, the engineering and agriculture group, which directors are upbeat about. 
Taylor Wimpey results are also out, plus we have the publications of a few reports into, amongst other things, the cost implications of a "hard" brexit. 
If you'd like to contribute tweet at @jnlbusiness to share your opinions, drop me a line at or tweet me at @Scoopford Share
